thread.title: We Hear: Julian Edelman, Kristen Wiig, Rupert Murdoch and more...
thread.title_full: We Hear: Julian Edelman, Kristen Wiig, Rupert Murdoch and more... | Boston Herald

author: Inside Track
title: We Hear: Julian Edelman, Kristen Wiig, Rupert Murdoch and more...
text:
We Hear: Julian Edelman, Kristen Wiig, Rupert Murdoch and more... Inside Track Monday, October 26, 2015 comments Tweet • That Julian Edelman will be the star of a new “E:60” documentary on ESPN Tuesday. In a preview, 11 gushes about his bromance with Tom Brady , confessing that he moved to L.A. just to be near his QB.
“I did anything for him, if he needed anything I’d go get it for him,” Edelman says of his first year on the team. So he was basically Turtle to Tom’s Vince. Got it ... Jules also does hilarious impressions of Brady and Bill Belichick , and when asked about his religion, says “I’m Jew-Ish.” Check it out at 8 p.m. tomorrow on ESPN.
• That the cast and crew of the horror thriller “Purge 3” will take over the Rhode Island Stateh ouse today, filming scenes in the speaker’s office, the governor’s state room, the Capitol Rotunda and the Statehouse basement. The futuristic thriller, about one night where all crime is legal, will finish shooting tomorrow.
• That Kristen Wiig was “bummed out” about all the Internet trolls who railed against the all-gal reboot of “Ghostbusters.”
“Some people said some really not nice things about the fact that there were women. It didn’t make me mad, it just really bummed me out. We’re really honoring these movies,” Wiig told the L.A. Times . Wiig, Melissa McCarthy , Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones star in the made-in-Boston flick that’s set to hit the megaplexes next summer.
• That media mogul Rupert Murdoch , former owner of Fox 2 5 and the Herald , is dating Jerry Hall , Mick Jagger ’s model ex. London’s Daily Mail said the 84-year-old billionaire and Hall, 59, took in a performance of the hit Broadway musical “Hamilton” together and will appear in public for first time at the Rugby World Cup final next week. Hall and Jagger were together for 13 years and have four children. Murdoch previously has been married to Patricia Booker , Anna Torv and Wendi Deng .
